article: On June 25, two days after our kidney transplant surgeries, my daughter-in-law, supported by her nurse and my son, walked into my hospital room in Seattle. There she was, the  _  of my kidney, smiling at the foot of my beD.That's when I realized the full  _  of "to give is to receive." I woke that evening, my son telling me that my left kidney was  working well  in my daughter-in-law. A strong sense of  _  washed over me. It was one of the most  _  moments of my life. Up to now, being able to see my daughter-in-law  benefit from  one of my kidneys has been one of the greatest gifts I have  _  received.
